name: Breaking and Entering
description:
Every cent that this game makes, I will bring to a grocery store and use to buy food. I will then take that food to a park or underpass or someplace else where homeless people congregate and distribute that food amongst them.

Its a game about a rich guy who's a dick to homeless people. You then get to follow him home and beat him up GTA style.

Arrow keys to move, Z to punch
